metadata.title: CVE-2017-14723 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Before version 4.8.2, WordPress mishandled % characters and additionalplaceholder values in $wpdb->prepare, and thus did not properly address thepossibility of plugins and themes enabling SQL injection attacks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14723` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.2+dfsg-1').
